Test Name: Bile Acids, Fractionated and Total, Serum
Purpose: To measure fractionated and total bile acids in serum to ensure accurate, reliable, and reproducible results.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or plain red-top tube
Equipment: High-Performance Liquid Chromatography (HPLC) or Liquid Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry (LC-MS/MS) system
